title: House in kottawa 2
details:
LAND DETAILS

The most luxurious and appreciated property offers by Prime Group, located in the middle of five well developed cities – Kottawa, Hokandara, Athurugiriya, Thalawathugoda and Malabe with easy access to facilities including two highway entrances, leading supermarkets, fashion outlets, banks, international schools and many more.
Prime Urban Art offers architecturally designed 160 two story houses with modern amenities. We have designed these villas to offer the utmost comfortable and convenience to your life.
